original_text: And when he had taken him down, behold, they were spread abroad over all the land, eating and drinking and dancing, because of all the great spoil they had taken from the land of the Philistines and from the land of Judah.
korean_text: 그가 다윗을 인도하여 내려가니 그들이 온 땅에 편만하여 블레셋 사람들의 땅과 유다 땅에서 크게 약탈하였음으로 말미암아 먹고 마시며 춤추는지라

sentences.original_text: And when he had taken him down,
they were spread abroad over all the land,
because of all the great spoil they had taken from the land of the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 블레셋 사람의 땅에서 빼앗은 모든 큰 탈취물 때문이었으니,

sentences.original_text: and from the land of Judah.
